choices: You run into someone you know in the diaper aisle
You begin to pick which kind you want
A worker comes up to talk to you
1.content:
You are a 16 year old high school boy who has never told anyone about how much you enjoy being in diapers. One day, you realize that your stash is starting to run dangerously low. When your parents are out for the weekend, you decide it is probably the best time to stock up.

You jump in your car and head over to the pharmacy in the next town over, you don't want anymore to know who you are. You walk in the store and head straight for the diaper aisle.

What happens next?
1.title: Time to go shopping

11.content:
As you walk into the diaper aisle, you are shocked to see your neighbor, Miss Parkin strolling through the aisle while pushing her two twin infants.

She recognizes you and immediately says "Hi Billy, what are you doing here? This is a little far from home?"

You quickly try to come up with something smart to say, but before anything leaves your mouth, she says: "Your mother and father told me they would be out of town this weekend, why are you in the diaper aisle anyway? Have a little one of your own?" She says as she lets out a laugh.

You stare at the ground awkwardly without knowing what to say.

After an awkward silence, she says..."Are these for you?"
11.title: You run into someone you know in the diaper aisle

111.content:
You decide you don't want to lie to her. She's always been so nice to you after all.

"Yes, the-they're for me" you say, turning beat red as you say this.

"It's OK, sweetie, I'm not upset with you or anything, just surprised that's all"

You lift your head quickly, stunned she would be so accepting of your admission.

"Don't be so shocked sweetie. I have two infant daughters remember? A child wearing diapers doesn't bother me too much. Though you are a bit old for them"

"So you like wearing diapers, Is that all you do?"

"What do you mean?"

"Well, your parents are gone for the weekend, would you like to stay with me for that time?"

"If it's diapers you want, I have plenty"
111.title: You confess and say yes

choices: Sharing the nursery with the twins
1111.content:
OK, I think I'd like that

"Splendid! Just give me a bit to finish my shopping and we'll head home then"

You wait for a bit, walking behind her as she pushes her infants in the stroller. After about 30 minutes or so, you've checked out and are at her car.

She puts the groceries in the trunk, and straps the infants into their carseats, then puts the stroller in the trunk as well.

"Did you want to be pushed in the stroller and have your own carseat as well?"

"What?"

"Oh nothing, let's head home"

You drive for a bit before arriving home, bringing in the kids, and the groceries.

Then Miss Parkin shows you to your room
1111.title: Accept her proposal

11112.content: What gender are the twins?
11112.title: Sharing the nursery with the twins

choices: She lowers the side of the second crib (time for a nap)
Up on the changing table (diaper change first)
111122.content:
Miss Parkin has twin girls Suzy and Lucy.

Once inside, she takes both of them to their room and lays them down in a pink crib for a nap. The crib is adorned with frilly overhangs clearly designed for little girls. You walk behind her, and get a look at their nursery with is almost completely pink, but with white trim. It also has sparkly letters spelling out the words Princesses along one of the walls and large images of Disney princess at multiple spots. There is a white changing table on one wall, that is very well stocked with diapers and changing supplies, and a rocking chair in one of the corners. There is also multiple stuffed animals and baby toys scattered about as well as larger toys like a bouncer and a baby swing.

The one thing that you found odd, was that there were two of these pink cribs, but Miss Parkin laid the twins down in one of them together, leaving you wondering why she needed two?

Why are there two cribs, if you just put them both in the same one? you asked

"Oh, well, they'll get bigger quickly, and sometimes it's best to separate them for various reasons, but so far, I haven't really needed the second one much at all."

"I'm glad I have it though, since I'll be needing another bed now"

Part of you knew exactly what she meant, but the other part was in strict denial. She can't mean? Can she?
111122.title: Twin girls

choices: Miss Parkin feeds you a bottle
11113.content:
"I was thinking you could stay in my room" says Miss Parkin as she points at the craddle.

You turn bright red, and look at your feet embarrassed.

"Oh sweetie, it's okay. Just try to relax, now let's see if you fit!" She says softly.

You nod and slowly approach the craddle.
Miss Parkin helps you in and quickly tucks you in very tight with a fluffy white blanket.

With your arms and legs wrapped in the blanket you notice you can barely move.

She walks out of the room, comes back in with a pacifier and pops it in your mouth.

You face turns red again as you suck on the pacifier, she just smiles and starts rocking you in the craddle.
11113.title: In Miss Parkin's room (cradle)

choices: Someone else comes into the aisle at that moment
115.title: Readers Choice

1151.title: Someone else comes into the aisle at that moment

choices: Your mom calls out questioningly, thinking she saw you.
You drop the diapers and try to sneak out.
11511.content:
From across the aisle, you see an unmistakable figure retrieving apples...

{x-link}https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C9AdaPXXYAAB...{/x-link}

Before she turns to enter the diaper aisle and makes eye contact, your heart thumps hard and it takes a split second before you turn away and quickly hide away at the end of the aisle.

'M-m-mom!?!'

It's only been a day since she and your father left. Even though you are in a different town, they should have been at least 4-5 hours away from here for their anniversary! Why have they came back so soon?!

You didn't see your father, but it's possible he's either waiting in the parking lot or grabbing some items in parallel elsewhere.

Given her attire, it's clear she was dressed up and looked as if she was coming back from date night or something. Could she and your father be returning early?!

'What do I do?!'

As you shake, you feel something in your hand. Looking down, it seemed you managed to snatch your package of diapers which makes you feel more nervous given the situation.

What happens?
11511.title: Your mother!

choices: that you are buying them for a friend.
that you are buying them for a dare.
that you have a bedwetting problem.
115113.content:
As you ponder about your next action, your Mother discovers you in your hiding spot and asks.

“Sweety what you are doing here with a package of diapers?”

You tell her
115113.title: Something else.

choices: She puts it into her cart. Will address it with you later.
An employee who has seen you too many times reveals to your mother.
1151131.content:
"G-gh...I....um..."

With your face flushed red, you stare at your mother with a horrified expression. She seems quite surprised to find you, particularly with a pair of adult-sized diapers.

There were many ways you could play this off but already in the middle of breaking down, you can't seem to stop the brakes in your mind.

Excuses...excuses...what about-

"I-I like them!"

That wasn't an excuse.

That was an admission!

Only seconds after blurting out from sheer pressure, your redden complexion turns pale once you made such a dumb mistake.

Your mother, Jane blinks and is taken aback by your sudden hurried voice; however, there was no mistaking what she heard.

"You...like them?"

Sweat begins pouring down your forehead. Oddly, you feel a little more level-headed after admitting but seeing how your mother seems confused, you quickly try to change the subject.

"I mean, nevermind-What are you doing here? I thought you and dad were supposed to be miles away?"

Jane blinks a few more times and then expresses concern, but she doesn't push. "I was about to call you after this. The lake we were supposed to visit for our anniversary was closed due to a landslide. We had to cancel our plans early."

"O-oh, I see!" you exclaim, laughing forcefully, "...that sucks. I'm sorry for you guys."

Jane smiles sweetly and then caresses you cheek, a maternal habit that you've gotten used to. While embarrassing, being caught was more embarrassing and you couldn't help worry now about what your mother would think.

"Oh sweetie, it is what it is. Since we have some time left with this weekend, maybe we can do something together as a family, hm?"

"Er...yeah, yeah...that sounds good. Um...well, I just got to...pick something up I needed, that's all."

Jane raises an eyebrow, then points at the package of diapers. "This?"

Seeing that somehow you still are holding it, you quickly shove it into the incorrect shelf and reveal your empty hands.

"No, no! I just...took that by accident! I was just going to buy...um...body wash. Yeah, I was running out of some in my shower."

Jane hums, still worried about your behavior. "I thought I bought some last week though?"

"A-anyways!" you force, feeling more crazed the longer you stood with her, "...I'll just head out and meet you guys back home. Go um...continue whatever you were doing. I'll be fine!"

"I...okay? Just take it easy, sweetie. I won't be here for long. Just grabbing some stuff we're missing while your father is waiting inside the car."

"I-I will, see ya!"

Desperate to get out there, you quickly walk away from your mother and stopping at the soap and body wash aisle too, only to grab something to at least match your story.

Jane watches you disappear then looks at the desperately pushed bag of diapers. Only a fool would believe her son wasn't lying. Although she didn't want to make you uncomfortable, it feels like this is hard to ignore. What does she do?
1151131.title: The Truth Comes Out

choices: She checks out and talks to her husband, Eric.
She decides to buy a few more items for you.
11511312.content:
Meanwhile you poorly attempted to excuse yourself after being caught and exit the scene, a local employee who has seen you too many times buy the same pair of adult-diapers could not help but chuckle and shake his head at the exchange.

It's not his job to pry; however, he couldn't help but feel like giving some advice to what he assumed to be the mother.

"Excuse me, miss. Can I help you with anything?" he begins with a friendly worker greeting.

Jane flinches, not expecting the approaching employee but she provides a friendly smile back. "Oh no. I'm good, thanks."

The employee hums, then decides to get straight to the point. "Well miss, I thought I should at least let you know that I've seen your son quite a few times around here."

Jane widens her eyes. "Wait, you do?"

The employee grins, "Yes, he's always buying diapers. I don't mean to pry, but...it's obvious he didn't expect to see you. I figure you might want to know considering you're his parent."

Jane furrows her brows. Though she didn't want to know, her concern over your well-being took priority. "What do you mean? Why would he buy diapers without telling us?"

What does she do?

The employee clears his throat. "I don't claim to know what your son is going through, but I have two types of cousins up North. One of them has an incontinent problem and it's usually why people, especially elderly buys these and my other...well..."

Not wanting to offend the mother by claiming you had a diaper fetish (Which you do), he leaves it off like that but Jane understands it well. She isn't aware that you had any issues with your bladder but then again, she never knew you were buying diapers until now.

It's hard not to believe this stranger's observation when you clearly broke down in front of her.

"Thank you, sir. I don't think you need to be concerned about my family though."

The employee backs away and raises his hands, "Of course! Just wanted to help. Regardless, I'm sure you'll support him."

Jane can't help but smile, a little appreciative. "Thank you, again."

With that, she leaves but not before snatching the package of diapers you were about to take.
11511312.title: An employee who has seen you too many times rev...

choices: Talk with her, but be more honest this time.
Try to play it off for a school project.
115113121.content:
Despite wanting to give you the benefit of doubt, the fact that an employee of this store has seen him buy diapers a few times before concerns her.

However, what he said is also true. Perhaps there is a reason you've been picking diapers...or perhaps not. Either way, what could a mother do?

For now, she adds the package of diapers and continues shopping. After checking out, she sees her husband Eric remaining in the car with his eyes closed and seat reclined.

She hums internally, wondering how she should break the news. Upon opening up the trunk to stuff the groceries in, Eric opens his eyes and yawns, readjusting his seat back as his wife finishes unloading the cart.

Once done, she enters the drivers seat but doesn't restart the car. She narrows her eyes and hesitates which Eric picks up immediately.

"What's wrong, babe?"

"Well...I saw our son."

"Huh? He was here? Wait, isn't there a store closer to our home?"

Jane takes a deep breath and leans back. "There must be a reason. Honey, I know this is going to be strange but...I saw him try to checkout some diapers."

Eric blinks. "What?"

"...and I talked with an employee who confessed this isn't the first time."

"What? That's ridiculous, Jane. We haven't seen him needing any diapers. Why would he buy it for himself? Are you sure it's not for someone else."

"...but Eric...he freaked out when he saw me."

Eric widens his eyes. "Huh?!"

Jane continues, feeling guilty and hopeful that her husband would understand. "I wouldn't have brought this up but I'm sure I definitely heard him say he...liked them."

Becoming quickly weary of this conversation, he tries to dismiss it. "Babe, this is crazy-"

"Eric, I'm serious!"

Seeing a fierceness in her eyes, Eric quickly shuts up and then comes to an understanding that this may be real. If so, it's troubling.

"Jane, he probably didn't expect to see us so early and it's our fault for not calling him sooner. Even if it may be true, let's give him the benefit of the doubt."

"That might be the right approach but...I'm going to talk with him."

"What? Embarrass him and tell him not to buy diapers again?"

This is where things might become weird. Jane hesitates a little before sighing. "I...bought some diapers that he was about to buy before he left them."

"Wait, what?"

"Eric, this sounds strange but...I want to support him. If it's nothing, it's nothing. If he has a problem that he's been hiding from us, then I want to at least offer my support. Is that alright?"

Eric closes his eyes and pinches the bridge of his nose. "You've always been overprotective of him..."

"Eric, please..."

"Look, I understand. I think you're blowing this out of proportion though. In any case, he's also my son. If there is a problem, I'll also be here to work it out with him."

Figuring that would be enough, Jane smiles and leans over to kiss her husband. "Thank you, honey."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------

"Fuck, fuck!"

Back at home, you scramble inside your room. This might possibly the worst day of your life being caught like that. You try to blame it on your parents at first, figuring they should have let you know first but then you also know you're at fault, for having a fetish like this.

You grew too confident, thinking you'd be able to hide this quirk about yourself.

Now, what do you do? Despite your panicked attempt to reassure her, you knew that your mother wouldn't forget this. You hoped to god that your father didn't know any more about this either.

"Shit, what do I do?" you say, biting your fingernails.

You were too busy panicking and trying to figure out your way to explain this all out that you didn't realize how quick your parents would be driving behind you coming home.

You hear a knock at your door causing you to freeze. It was your mother.

"Sweetie? Can I come in?"

Realizing you couldn't panic a second, you try to contain your racing heartbeat and clear your throat. "Um...just give me a few seconds."

Trying to recollect yourself, Jane made a second bombshell that causes you to pale.

"I...also brought the diapers you were going to buy. Sweetie, I know this is strange but...I'm not angry. Can we talk?"

What? Why would she buy diapers? Even if she was concerned, wouldn't avoiding it be the better choice overall?

What do you do?
115113121.title: She checks out and talks to her husband, Eric.

choices: Tell her there's no bedwetting issue. You simply like to wear them.
Pretend you have a bedwetting problem and reason that's why you wear them.
1151131211.content:
You're at a loss. Perhaps if you didn't freak out as much as you did, you could play things off cooly but you didn't. It would've been obvious to anyone that you were lying.

Gulping, you felt like you couldn't change the topic or try another excuse again. Feeling heavy, you gave permission to your mother to enter.

"Come in."

Resigned, you sit on your bedside and watch your mother coming in, a weak smile on her face. Still in her tight blue dress, you watch feeling rather ashamed of yourself that you had to make her concerned, probably adding to the disappointment in having to cancel their plans early.

"Mom, I-"

Closing the door, Jane interrupts your thoughts, gently hushing you. She sits next to you on the bed and places a hand by your leg. Held in her other hand was a package of diapers, the ones you were about to buy.

"Sweetie, I want you to first realize that no matter what, I love you. If you want, I can forget about this whole thing. It won't be brought up again."

You widen your eyes a little, shocked however you knew that wouldn't eliminate the awkwardness you would feel about her knowing that you bought diapers.

"...or," she continues, "...I'd really like it if my son put his trust in me. If you do have a problem that we were never aware about...like bed wetting, then there's no shame. You probably will handle yourself fine anyways. I promise that we won't question if you ever bring some diapers home."

Paling at her choice of words, you stare at her in disbelief as you pick at her words. "Wait, we?"

Seeing that she might have gone ahead of herself, Jane smiles apologetically. "Sorry, I did talk to your father before. Neither of us has the full picture, but we'll support you I promise. You don't have to be afraid."

"Oh god," you groaned, planting your face into your hands.

Jane flinches, feeling guilty that she made things worse. She tries to console you and leans closer, placing an arm around you and hugging you closer.

"Oh sweetie, it's okay! Please, I only want to understand and help. You don't have to tell us anything but if you do, we won't judge. I swear!"

Feeling emotions rise in her voice, you are embarrassed but somehow hopeful. Your mother seems to be trying her hardest to be understanding. If your father is also willing to be understanding, it might not be as dire as you hold.

Since the gig was up, you know that you couldn't continue to buy diapers like this anymore. Even if your parents turn the other way, it no longer felt right.

What do you do?
1151131211.title: Talk with her, but be more honest this time.

choices: She asks if you if want to be babied again.
She tells you that you don't have to hide yourself anymore.
11511312111.content:
You remove your face from your hands and take a deep breath. You feel your mother's curves as she keeps you close. While it's embarrassing to hear from others that you have such a hot mother, you're happy that she keeps herself healthy and fit.

That aside, you want to make sure she worries less. Seeing how she'll know, you decide to be honest even if it kills you. The last thing you wanted your parents to think is that you have incontinence issues.

"Mom, to be honest...I didn't lie when I said I liked them. There's no issue with me um...leaking or anything either. I just...like to wear them."

Hearing that, Jane raises her eyebrows in surprise. She wanted to believe that there was an underlying bodily issue but to think its far simpler than that.

"You like them?"

Your face turns red and although you want to cry in a corner, you clenched your hands together and nodded. "Y-yes...on occasion."

"I...Is something wrong that you have to wear them?"

You gulp, then avoid her gaze. "J-just...maybe? They're comfy and feel nice so I tend to wear them when I'm alone or go to sleep."

Jane remains silent and seeing her son struggling and tearing up, she knew she shouldn't question it. She recalls what the employee had said...there's two kinds of people.

So what if her son is the stranger kind?

Thinking on it, she wonders how she should support him?
11511312111.title: Simply wanting to wear them.

11513.content: Which teacher do you see?
11513.title: One of your school teachers

115133.content: Who else could it be?
115133.title: Someone else

choices: Miss Thomas (In charge of the the adjoining Pre-school and Nursery)
1151333.content: Who else could it be?
1151333.title: Someone else

choices: She has little ones at home.
11513332.content:
You see Miss Thomas, who you recognize as being in charge of the adjoining Pre-school and Daycare/Nursery next to the Elementary School. She's a young attractive redhead, and a lot of the HS guys spend their time fantasizing about her, so she has a large number of fans. Personally, your thought have gravitated that way very little, and you've looked at her in a more "respectful" tone. You've always admired how kind and motherly she is, especially with all the little ones she's in charge of every day.

Being that she works in a totally different building, you've obviously never been introduced, so she doesn't recognize you at all, but your nervousness and blushing are only bringing attention to yourself.

What is she doing there?
11513332.title: Miss Thomas (In charge of the the adjoining Pre...

choices: Your Grandmother (Wasn't a teacher after all)
11513333.title: Someone else

115133331.content: Already gave birth or not?
115133331.title: Miss Stone (On Maternity leave)

1151333311.content:
You see Miss Stone walking down the aisle. She's in her early 20s, and was 8 months pregnant with a clearly showing belly. She taught English usually, but was on leave until she gave birth.

As she comes down the aisle she spots you. Does she recognize you?
1151333311.title: 8 months pregnant (ready to pop)

choices: She wants a practice baby to get ready for her real child
11513333111.content:
She looks right at you.

"Oh hey, Billy right? I think I have you second period."

You stand there motionless, not sure what to say.

She get a strange look on her face as she clearly sees what's in your hands.

What does she want?
11513333111.title: yes

115133331112.content:
Since you seem to like diapers so much, I have a proposition for you Billy.

I'm really close to giving birth, but I've been looking for a chance to get some practice in on a real child before I have my first. I've spent some time with other mothers and their kids, but it's only limited, and actually having a baby around 24/7 would help me out a lot.

What do you say, would you be interested in being my baby for a while?

Her idea seems insane; get treated like her baby? Plus you know your parents will be out for the weekend, but what about after that?
115133331112.title: She wants a practice baby to get ready for her ...

choices: OK, but only for the weekend
Offer to help her some other way
1151333311123.title: Something else

choices: Size of an action figure (about 6 inches or so)
1152.content: How small do you shrink to?
1152.title: You start to shrink

choices: Hide on the shelves of diapers
11523.content:
Without any kind of warning (or explanation), you suddenly began to shrink. The reduction was almost instantaneous, making it appear to Miss Parkin as if you disappeared completely, rather than shrunk.

"Billy?"

"Where did you go?" "How did you do that?"

As she talks, you stand there at the foot of her feet, trying to make sense of what just happened. You try to call out to her, but because of your size, and her own attempts to call out to you, she does not hear you.

Suddenly, she takes a step forward. You only barely avoid being squashed.

You realize you'll be in trouble if you stay out in the open on the floor like this, so, for now at least, you need to move.

You decide to...
11523.title: Size of an action figure (about 6 inches or so)

choices: Into the seats with the infants
Continue crawling to the top to get Miss Parkin's attention
115232.content:
You decide the best course of action would be to climb up the stroller.

If you get higher, you might be able to get Miss Parkin's attention, and at very least, it would help to get you home, since she lived very near by.

You ran over to one of the wheels, and began climbing. Miss Parkin was still looking for you, so it gave you a bit of time to crawl up. Once you were sufficiently on the stroller frame, you needed to decide where to go from here.
115232.title: Climb up the stroller

1152321.content: What gender are the infants?
1152321.title: Into the seats with the infants

choices: In one of the bags hanging from the stroller
1152322.content:
You decide that the best choice for now would be to hide somewhere on the stroller until you arrive at Miss Parkin's home, and then try and assess the situation from there.

But where to hide...
1152322.title: Find some place to hide

choices: Yes, into somewhere else in the diaper bag
No, Miss Parkin grabs the diaper he is inside, trapping him
11523223.content:
You decide to hide in the bags hanging from the stroller, and quickly jump inside what you believe to be Miss Parkin's purse.

You fall inside and are met with softness all around you. As you try to move around, you quickly realize the truth, this was not her purse. It was the infant's diaper bag, and you had clearly fallen inside of one of the infant's diapers.

You remember that Miss Parkin had to twin girls, so this was definitely a girls' diaper, and the last thing that you wanted was to be stuck there for what may follow.

As you try to move though, you are suddenly shifted, and fall back down inside the diaper, as the stroller begins to move.

"I guess Miss Parkin stopped looking for me," you thought.

You try to shift out of the diaper, but all the shaking is keeping you from being able to make much progress.

But then the stroller finally comes to a stop. You listen for a bit, and can hear crying outside of the stroller.

"O_ I__ ge_ yo_ __anged righ_ _ow swee__" you hear muffled through both the diaper and the bag.

Uh oh, I gotta get out of here, now!

Does he get out before the bag is opened?
11523223.title: In one of the bags hanging from the stroller

choices: Run out of the diaper and try to signal Miss Parkin
Continue to hide, maybe it won't be so bad?
115232232.content:
Just as you think you're about to escape your soft prison, the diaper is pressed shut and you fall back into the center, as it is lifted out of the bag.

Miss Parkin then lays the diaper down and you are able to get a quick moment to assess the situation. You can hear Miss Parkin attending to one of the children. Her two infant daughters are named Suzy and Lucy, and from what little you hear, you think she is in the process of changing Lucy.

You are able to get far enough to the outside of the diaper now to see a bit, and realize that you are in the pharmacy restroom, and on a changing table. You also can see there is nowhere for you to go, as there is nowhere to hide, and you are much too high to jump from with your current size.

What do you do?
115232232.title: No, Miss Parkin grabs the diaper he is inside, ...

1152322323.content:
Your hesitation becomes your undoing, and Miss Parkin finishes attending to Lucy, and grabs the diaper you're in, taking you along for the ride.

She then opens up the diaper, laying on the table. As it opens, you can clearly see the half naked child above you about to be lowered.

Does Miss Parkin notice you?
1152322323.title: Took too long, you're grabbed

11523223232.content:
Unfortunately for you, she is too busy making baby noises and Lucy to keep her pacified, and she doesn't see you.The child is lowered down on top of you, and the diaper is very quickly taped tightly around the infant girl's waist.

Where are you trapped?
11523223232.title: No, trapped

115233.content:
You decide your best course of action would be to climb the shelf, and hide behind a package of diapers for the time being.

You crawl up and hide behind some Pampers, but after a bit, while you are contemplating your next move, someone grabs the pack you are hiding behind.

Who is it?
115233.title: Hide on the shelves of diapers

choices: One that offers a chance to win a trip (you might win)
The store manager asks if you need any help
You look at more diaper options
12.content:
Looking at all the diaper options, you are overwhelmed by the choices you have! There's diapers for almost every need! There's a bunch of different sizes to choose, from baby diapers, kids diapers, teen diapers, and up to adult diapers. Then you can choose disposable, cloth, or pull up, and you can get special offer packages! Like one with a numbing agent to make you totally un potty trained for a while. One with time lock. Another one that offers a chance to win a trip to a diaper resort. And many more!

Looking over your options, what do you grab?
12.title: You begin to pick which kind you want

122.content: How will they affect you?
122.title: One with spcial side affects

1221.content: Was this intended or unexpected?
1221.title: They shrink you

12212.content: Are you changed in the store or somewhere else?
12212.title: Surprise!

122121.content:
You gather up your courage and head to the register with your pick in hand. Surprisingly, you're able to buy them without incident. You can't wait to use them so you quickly sneak off to the restroom to put one on to wear while heading home.

You enter the restroom and after entering a stall, rip open the plastic. What kind did you buy?
122121.title: Store

1221211.content:
You got some Pampers size 5. They come with cute sesame street images for little ones.

You drop your pants, and tape the diaper on. It just fits.

As soon as you do though, you feel strange, and you start to shrink. How much though?
1221211.title: Baby diapers (cute designs)

choices: Check the womens restroom next to the mens
12212112.content:
All of a sudden, you are now a perfect fit for the diapers you just put on. No longer are they stretched to fit you, but instead they look like they were made for you.

Your clothes no longer fit, leaving you standing there in nothing but a diaper. Not sure what to do, you head toward the door, hoping to find some help. Well, waddle is more like it as the diaper now pushes your legs apart as you go.

You mange to push the door open, but where to go?
12212112.title: Size of a toddler

What do you see?

122121122311.content:
You see a young woman, looking like she's in her 20s finishing up changing her infant. The woman is in the furthest stall with the changing table, but didn't bother to close it; must not have thought she'd be there long.

You watch a bit as she finishes taping the fresh diaper on the child, making baby noises at it as she does so. Once done, she takes the dirty diaper and turns toward the trash can to dispose of it, facing you.

Does she notice you?

You're blushing a little and your heart is racing while you pick up the diapers from the shelf and head to the checkout. Luckily the cashier doesn't seem to pay any attention to the fact that you're buying diapers so everything goes without incident. You quickly get out of the store and drive home.

When you arrive you immediately open up the package, a package of _______ to be exact.

15.content:
As you slowly waddled through the aisle of diapers, you were overwhelmed by the sheer quantity of different brands. There were diapers specialized for everything these days. As time passed and your indecisiveness prevented you from leaving. You felt an agonizing pain roaring through your stomach as you almost fell to your knees.
Placing your hand on a shelf to pull yourself onto your feet, but as you tried to find the nearest bathroom. Your body started to diminish in size rapidly, as you saw you were plummeting right onto a shelf of unwrapped diapers.
Thankfully your landing was somewhat soft, but the situation still horrified you. Disoriented and confused, you could barely believe what was happening, although you had no time to properly think about it, as you realized someone else had entered the aisle.

Milf.
A blonde, bombshell of a milf waddled through, with a rear so thick and plump that it's jiggles could be seen from her front. Apparently she was spending the evening with her girlfriends for Taco Tuesday, and was looking for a sturdy diaper.

Bully.
Your highschool bully found out about your diaper fetish a few weeks ago, and after inexplicably getting her hands on a shrinking serum, decided to have some fun with you.

Two Girls One Diaper.
Two conspicuous girls in their teens snuck into the aisle, looking around franticly to make sure noone was around. Apparently they had a secret fetish of their own. Where they would share a diaper and relieve themselves into it.
15.title: You shrink.

151.content: You see this thick and beautiful bombshell of a milf walk into the aisle, browsing some options for the night. Quickly you had to think! Should you stay hidden where you are, and hope she doesn't see you? Or should you hop out, and make a less awkward introduction.
151.title: Milf.

choices: A manager comes up to ask if she needs any help
1511.content:
You decide to stay hidden in your spot, which seems to be a open box of diapers. No wonder the landing was soft.

The milf is getting closer to the box your hiding in. So you decide to cover yourself under the diapers in hopes she won't see you. looking through a gap in diapers over top of yourself, Soon enough, she was standing in front of the box you were in.

Does she notice you?
1511.title: Stay hidden where you are

choices: You see a woman who looks like she needs a bathroom
1512.content:
You decide its best to hop out, so she won't find it weird to find a teen hiding between diaper boxes.

"Oh my! Sorry you spooked me cutie. Why were you behind those boxes?" The milf asks you.

"I ummm... i thought i saw a quarter behind them, but i was wrong." You say trying to make up an excuse. "So are just passing through this isle? Or are you grabbing something for a kid?" You ask trying to make small talk.

"Oh no haha, I'm grabbing some for myself. Taco Tuesdays are too rough on my panties, so i thought diapers would hold up to more abuse, and you dont have to clean the after." She said grabbing her usual box of diapers, and throwing it in the cart. "Hold on, I'm getting a text." She says pulling her phone from the bra holding her D sized tits. "Oh darn. One of the girls has canceled on taco Tuesday, and I've already placed the order. Those tacos are going to waste for sure." She puts the phone back in her bra and looks a little upset.

"You know, if the foods going to waist, i could come if you want me too." You say trying to cheer you up.

"Really? You'd do that for us? Your so kind!" The milf says giving you a big hug. She then lets go and reaches up for another box of diapers. "If your coming too, might as well pick up some for you. Don't worry, this ones on me." She says putting it in the cart. "Oh and heres my number." The milf said handing you a card.

You add her number to your contacts, and you get the info for the night. "Thanks! Ill see you later."

What happens next?
1512.title: Hop out and introduce yourself

choices: Run and grab her a diaper
Offer yourself to be her toilet
She shits herself before you can do anything
15123.content:
After you part ways with the milf, you go to the next aisle to grab some snacks for the week, but when you enter the aisle. You see a hot 20 year old chick leaning with her hand on the shelf. At first you think she's just looking over her options for food, but as you get closer it becomes apparent she's in desperate need of a toilet.

You walk up the the lady and say. "Hey are you all right?"

She looks at you wincing from the pain in her gut. "Not really. I've been constipated for a good week, and it feels like the laxatives i took this morning are taking effect." You then hear a loud fart escape from her plump ass. *FFFfffppppppppprrrrrrrrrrttttttttttt* "oh god! If i move one bit ill shit myself."

"Is there any way i can help?" You ask.

*FFFfffrrrttt* "Got any ideas?" She says to you. letting another one rip.
15123.title: You see a woman who looks like she needs a bath...

Suddenly you see two teenage girls walk into the aisle, so you duck behind a box of diapers, and peek out at the two girls, and you think to yourself. 'Do i know these two?'
